metadata.title: CVE-2022-23808 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin 5.1 before 5.1.2. An attacker caninject malicious code into aspects of the setup script, which can allow XSSor HTML injection.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
